title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! Add a touch of luxury and elegance to your living space with these stunning pillow covers. 

Made from 100% velvet, these covers are incredibly soft and comfortable, providing the perfect place to rest your head after a long day. The gold color adds a touch of sophistication and glamour to any room.

With a size of 18 x 18 inches (45 x 45 cm), these pillow covers are perfect for your couch, sofa, or bed. The pack includes two covers, allowing you to instantly transform the look of your space.

The invisible zipper closure adds a seamless and polished look to the covers. The zipper is longer than 35cm, ensuring easy insertion and removal of the pillow inserts.

These covers are versatile and can be used in various settings, including the living room, bedroom, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even in your car. The possibilities are endless!

Cleaning these pillow covers is a breeze. They are machine washable, and we recommend using cold water and a low drying temperature to maintain their softness and quality.

At GIGIZAZA, we value your feedback and strive for continuous improvement. Our customer support team is always available to assist you and listen to your suggestions.

Upgrade your home decor with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. Experience the ultimate in comfort and style. Order now and elevate your space to new heights!

These pillow covers are suitable for use in various settings, including the living room, bedroom, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even in your car. They are not only decorative but also functional, providing extra comfort and support.
